articles.content: Over the years, Xiaomi has managed to carve a niche for itself and one of the most popular smartphone brands in India today. Apart from phones, the company has a range of electronic products to offer… [+2296 chars]

articles.title: Nothing Phone 2 Receives Nothing OS 2.0.2a Update With Camera Improvements: How to Download - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Nothing Phone 2 is getting the Nothing OS 2.0.2 update with key camera improvements. These include better low light performance for photos that include faces, while the company has also optimised the HDR mode.
articles.content: Nothing Phone 2 is receiving a software update that comes on the heels of the recently released Nothing OS 2.0.2 firmware, which rolled out to the company's second-generation smartphone. This minor s… [+2818 chars]
